data.title: Mutual Fund 700questions and Answers PDF
data.meta_description: Mutual Fund 700Questions and answers.pdf - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. This document contains a practice test for the NISM Mutual Fund Distributors Certification Examination. It includes 23 multiple choice questions testing various aspects of mutual funds regulations, operations, and terminology. Correct answers are indicated for each question. The test covers topics such as commission structures for distributors, AMFI guidelines, portfolio valuation methods, exit loads, time stamping requirements, SEBI regulations on charges and disclosures, capital gains tax periods, and KYC documentation norms.
